citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1450 hours on 22-
MAR-22. The doorbell was rung twice, the applicant's phone number was called twice, a voicemail was left on the
applicant's cell phone, and inspectors waited 25 minutes for the applicant to arrive.
Additional Inspectors:
BRITTANY LIGHT, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1450 hours on 22-
MAR-22. The doorbell was rung twice, the applicant's phone number was called twice, a voicemail was left on the 
applicant's cell phone, and inspectors waited 25 minutes for the applicant to arrive. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
BRITTANY LIGHT, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
